actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit, in certain cases, a woman who in good faith has gone through a marriage ceremony, to be considered the widow even though, because of a legal impediment she is not legally married to the individual.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Permits, under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act, a woman who in good faith has gone through a marriage ceremony with an individual to be considered the widow of such individual even though, because of a legal impediment, such woman is not legally married to such individual to enable her to collect widow's benefits under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit, in certain cases, a woman who in good faith has gone through a marriage ceremony, to be considered the widow even though, because of a legal impediment she is not legally married to the individual.
